about_the_game:
Find salvation in death.

Void Foundation: Into The Void is a roguelite RPG game.

This game is very heavily inspired by SCP, Made in Abyss, Darkest Dungeon, 40K universe.
In this game, you will play as a void adventurer and join the Void Foundation. You will fight monsters in the void, extract void energy from them, collect monster materials to make equipment, and learn them... But be careful, a small misjudgment may lead to your death. But don't worry... because...

“Death — does not relieve you from your duty.

—Military Training Officer, Department of Supervision

"Human beings think that the world behind the door is hell, but they never thought that human greed is the real hell."

Explore a time when human history was rewritten before World War II when an explorer discovered a Void Gate to the Void. In this new timeline, magic and technology will be taken to another level because of the discovery of the Void.


"Our physical rules do not apply to void monsters. Only weapons and armor made of void monster materials can fight against them."


Collect monster materials and use their powers to fight against them.


"Mutations, drug addiction, permanent injuries　—　These are all holding you back"


The void itself is dangerous enough, now you have to deal with these problems.

"The research department may produce various research reports and records when studying these monsters."

Even a seemingly weak void monster may have an interesting story behind it.


-------------------------------------------------- -------------
． All kinds of completely random events in the void.
． There are also fixed events customized for special scenarios.
． Each new chapter introduces one or two new systems.
—Chapter 2: Pet System
． A dice roll skill check system refer to D&D's dice roll.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains foul language, numerous deaths, and depictions of the use of addictive drugs. 
It may not be suitable for everyone.

name: Void Foundation: Into The Void Demo
short_description: Void Foundation: Into The Void is a roguelite RPG game. Join The Void Foundation. Fight all kinds of strange monsters and study them, use their materials to craft all the thing you need. Serve humanity in a future where history is rewritten and magic and technology are combined.
